quote: Behind every flinch is a fear or an anxiety - sometimes rational, sometimes not. Without the fear, there is no flinch. But wiping out the fear isn't what's important - facing it is.
quote_letters: BEHIND EVERY FLINCH IS A FEAR OR AN ANXIETY - SOMETIMES RATIONAL SOMETIMES NOT WITHOUT THE FEAR THERE IS NO FLINCH BUT WIPING OUT THE FEAR ISNT WHATS IMPORTANT - FACING IT IS
